differences.justification: FIPS-12191: Deprecated method removed (marked forRemoval=true since 24.7). Use a custom Adapter.
FIPS-12191: Deprecated method removed (marked forRemoval=true since 24.7). Was renamed to DecimalAdapter and moved to faktorips-runtime-jakarta-xml and faktorips-runtime-javax-xml
FIPS-12191: Deprecated method removed (marked forRemoval=true since 24.7). Was renamed to GregorianCalendarAdapter and moved to faktorips-runtime-jakarta-xml and faktorips-runtime-javax-xml
FIPS-12191: Deprecated method removed (marked forRemoval=true since 24.7). Was renamed to MoneyAdapter and moved to faktorips-runtime-jakarta-xml and faktorips-runtime-javax-xml
